gw.api.contact

Class TooLooseContactSearchCriteriaException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException
            • gw.api.contact.ContactSubtypeSpecificException
              • gw.api.contact.TooLooseContactSearchCriteriaException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasErrorInfo, java.io.Serializable

    public class TooLooseContactSearchCriteriaException
extends ContactSubtypeSpecificException
    An exception thrown when an ABContact lacks required information for searching. Throwing such an exception can help ensure the performance of search features.

    The exception message depends on the ABContact's subtype and a specified country. Please see the displaykeys that begin with "Java.TooLooseContactSearchCriteriaException." to see how subtypes and countries map to specific displaykeys.

    See Also:
